name: Robot Rush (Makbeard)
description:
This is not your typical tower defense game. You have a limited number of towers to use to prevent the enemy robots from blowing up your base.
  • Click on red blocks to place a tower
  • Clicking a new spot after reaching your tower maximum will relocate your oldest tower
  • Try to finish all 5 levels!
This game was created as part of my participation in the "Complete C# Unity Developer 3D: Learn to Code Making Games" course.
